long_description: Designed for ounce-conscious backpackers, climbers and travelers, the Black Diamond Orbit lantern doubles as a flashlight and outputs bright, non-glaring light in an ultra-portable package. Features a DoublePower LED enclosed in a frosted globe; dual reflectors effectively capture and distribute light. LED puts out 60 lumens on high and 10 lumens on low; illuminates an area approximately 7.5m in diameter on high. Fine-tune your lighting needs with the dimming switch-simply hold down the on/off button to activate dimmer. Turn on the DoublePower LED in the bottom of the lantern to use the Orbit has a handheld flashlight; flashlight mode outputs 40 lumens on high and 10 lumens on low. Collapsible design saves space in your pack and protects on/off button from accidental activation; goes from 6.3 in. tall to 4.3 in. when collapsed. Unique double-hook hanging system on top provides a simple and secure thread-through or clip-in attachment point for string, fabric loops or branches. Rubber feet stabilize lantern when set on table or ground. Four AAA batteries, sold separately, provide 100 hrs. of use on low and 13 hrs. on high in lantern mode; provide 100 hrs. on low and 65 hrs. on high in flashlight mode. Provides IPX4 water resistance for protection against sprayed water.
short_description: Designed for ounce-conscious backpackers, climbers and travelers, the Black Diamond Orbit lantern doubles as a flashlight and outputs bright, non-glaring light in an ultra-portable package.
